label: Keemple smart radiator
description: Electronic Radiator Thermostat, Intended for Use with Water Based Room Radiators.

metadata.inclusion: Press and release the menu button (with a dot).
metadata.exclusion: Press and release the menu button (with a dot).
metadata.reset: Remove the battery cover and take out one battery. While reinserting the battery, press and hold the menu button (with a dot) for about 5 seconds.
